headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Moderna Stock Plunges After Resignation of FDA Vaccine Official
summary: The S&P 500 gained 0.6% on Monday, March 31, boosted by an afternoon rally even as investors brace for the planned onset of reciprocal tariffs later this week.

raw.headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Moderna Stock Plunges After Resignation of FDA Vaccine Official
raw.summary: The S&P 500 gained 0.6% on Monday, March 31, boosted by an afternoon rally even as investors brace for the planned onset of reciprocal tariffs later this week.

headline: Lululemon Athletica (NasdaqGS:LULU) Shares Drop 13% in a Week Despite Strong Earnings
summary: Lululemon Athletica (NasdaqGS:LULU) reported strong financial results for the fiscal year and fourth quarter, with significant improvements in sales and net income compared to the previous year. Despite these positive earnings announcements, the company's share price fell 13% over the past week. Contributing to the decline could be the broader market turbulence, as the major stock indices, such as the S&P 500 and Nasdaq, experienced notable losses amid renewed concerns over tariffs and...

headline: Lululemon Says It's Tackling 'Newness' Issues. The Economy Isn't Cooperating.
